Class AeSecurityProvider

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.security.AeSecurityProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeAuthorizationProvider, IAeLoginProvider, IAeSecurityProvider
public class AeSecurityProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAeSecurityProvider

Security provider that acesses login and authorization providers configured in the engine config
